org.pepstock.charba.client.data

Class BubbleDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.Dataset
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.BubbleDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasDataPoints

    public final class BubbleDataset
extends Dataset
implements HasDataPoints
    The chart allows a number of properties to be specified for each dataset. These are used to set display properties for a specific dataset.
    The location of the bubble is determined by the first two dimensions and the corresponding horizontal and vertical axes.
    The third dimension is represented by the size of the individual bubbles.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BubbleDataset()
      Creates a dataset.
      It uses the global options has default.
      BubbleDataset(IsDefaultOptions defaultValues)
      Creates the dataset using a default.

        hoverBorderWidthCallback - the hover border width callback to set
